sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Box, Text, Button } from '@blockstack/ui' import { authenticate } from '../auth' export const Signin = () => { return ( Welcome to Bitfari! The First Advertising DAO of America Testnet is now open!! Screen registration, ad booking and serving, campaign booking, discounts, billboard directory and booking, dashboards, life filter, it's all here! And for the poor souls lacking a Stacks Wallet: Get a Stacks Wallet Here (It's free and easy to set up!) ) }
